alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; Central Phoenix; North Phoenix, Glendale; Northwest Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 5:39PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 630 PM MST... At 538 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tolleson, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Glendale, Avondale, Goodyear, El Mirage, Tolleson, Laveen, Cashion, Litchfield Park, Glendale Sports Complex, Luke AFB, Arizona State Fairgrounds, Phoenix International Raceway, Camelback Ranch and Estrella Mountain Park. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 125 and 144. AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 198 and 204. US Highway 60 between mile markers 156 and 160. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Buckeye, Avondale; Central Phoenix; North Phoenix, Glendale; Northwest Valley
